archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.2.8c: c) securely destroy all information (on hard disk drives and removable media) once alternative arrangements are no longer required (e.g. main processing has resumed on the organisation's premises).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
